activities.name: Magnolia Blooms at Jardin Public
activities.description: Experience the stunning magnolia trees in full bloom at Jardin Public, Bordeaux's historic central park. The garden features beautiful springtime displays, charming walking paths, and a serene lake.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is perfect for enjoying the magnolias and camellias, which typically bloom from March to April.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required. Visit early morning for peaceful walks and great photography opportunities.

activities.name: Visit to CAPC Museum of Contemporary Art
activities.description: Explore contemporary art exhibitions housed in a former colonial warehouse at the CAPC Museum, one of France's most important contemporary art venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring showers make indoor cultural activities a good option, and the museum often features new exhibitions in spring.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid lines and check their website for special exhibitions.

activities.name: Bordeaux Wine Festival
activities.description: Participate in the Bordeaux Wine Festival, a biennial celebration featuring wine tastings, vineyard tours, and cultural exhibitions along the riverfront.
activities.seasonal_notes: This major event happens in even-numbered years and celebrates the region's prestigious wine heritage.
activities.booking_tips: Buy a tasting pass in advance and plan your route among the pavilions to maximize your experience.

activities.name: Picnic at Parc Bordelais
activities.description: Enjoy a leisurely picnic in Parc Bordelais, the city's largest park, featuring beautiful gardens, a duck pond, and plenty of green space.
activities.seasonal_notes: The park comes alive in spring with blooming flowers and pleasant temperatures perfect for outdoor dining.
activities.booking_tips: Visit local markets like Marché des Capucins beforehand to gather fresh local ingredients for your picnic.

activities.name: Rooftop Wine Tasting at Le Coq d'Argent
activities.description: Sip local wines while enjoying panoramic views of Bordeaux at Le Coq d'Argent, a stylish rooftop bar that offers an excellent selection of regional vintages.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring evenings offer comfortable temperatures and beautiful sunsets over the city.
activities.booking_tips: Make reservations in advance, especially for weekend evenings.

activities.name: Printemps des Vins de Blaye
activities.description: Visit the Spring Wine Festival in Blaye, featuring tastings from over 80 winemakers inside the historic UNESCO-listed citadel.
activities.seasonal_notes: This April festival celebrates the new vintage releases with a festive atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase your tasting pass online before the event to skip entrance queues.

activities.name: Explore Saint-Émilion
activities.description: Stroll through the charming medieval village of Saint-Émilion, a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its historic monuments and renowned vineyards.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring weather is ideal for exploring the cobblestone streets and surrounding vineyards as they turn green.
activities.booking_tips: Wear comfortable shoes for walking on cobblestones and book a guided tour to access underground monuments.

activities.name: Garonne River Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a scenic cruise along the Garonne River, taking in Bordeaux's UNESCO-listed waterfront and historic bridges.
activities.seasonal_notes: Springtime offers pleasant weather and beautiful light for river cruises with less tourism than summer months.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets a day or two in advance and consider sunset cruises for spectacular views.

activities.name: Spring Markets at Quai des Chartrons
activities.description: Explore the Sunday market along Quai des Chartrons, offering fresh produce, artisanal goods, and seasonal specialties while enjoying river views.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring markets feature seasonal specialties like asparagus, strawberries, and early cherries from the region.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive before 10am for the best selection and a more relaxed shopping experience.

activities.name: Darwin Ecosystem Beach
activities.description: Enjoy the urban beach at Darwin Ecosystem, a creative hub in a former military barracks, featuring sandy areas, refreshments, and a relaxed atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: This unique summer spot provides a beach experience without leaving the city, perfect for hot days.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early on weekends to secure a good spot, and explore the street art while there.

activities.name: Bastille Day Celebrations
activities.description: Celebrate France's National Day on July 14th with fireworks over the Garonne River, concerts, and festivities throughout Bordeaux.
activities.seasonal_notes: Bastille Day is a highlight of the summer, with patriotic celebrations and spectacular fireworks over the riverfront.
activities.booking_tips: Find a spot along the riverbanks early in the evening and bring a picnic to enjoy while waiting for the fireworks.

activities.name: Open-Air Cinema at Parc de Peixotto
activities.description: Enjoy films under the stars in Talence's Parc de Peixotto during summer evenings, featuring a mix of classics and new releases.
activities.seasonal_notes: Warm summer evenings are perfect for outdoor cinema in the park's beautiful setting.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a blanket or portable chair and arrive at least 30 minutes before showtime to secure a good viewing spot.

activities.name: Visit to Château de La Brède
activities.description: Explore the beautiful château and gardens of La Brède, the birthplace of philosopher Montesquieu, located just outside Bordeaux.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is the best time to see the château's gardens in full bloom, with guided tours available of both the grounds and interior.
activities.booking_tips: Check their website for opening hours as they vary seasonally, and consider booking a guided tour in advance.

activities.name: Arcachon Bay Day Trip
activities.description: Escape to Arcachon Bay for swimming, oyster tasting, and climbing Europe's largest sand dune, Dune du Pilat.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is ideal for enjoying the Atlantic beaches and seafood, with water warm enough for swimming.
activities.booking_tips: Take an early train to maximize your day and bring comfortable shoes for climbing the dune.

activities.name: Cycling Through Vineyards
activities.description: Rent a bike and cycle through the vineyards of Médoc or Entre-Deux-Mers, stopping at châteaux for wine tastings along the way.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer mornings offer pleasant temperatures for cycling before the afternoon heat, with vineyards in full green foliage.
activities.booking_tips: Rent bikes in Bordeaux city center or join an organized tour that includes château visits and tastings.

activities.name: Dîner en Blanc
activities.description: Participate in the famous all-white dinner party, a flash mob event where participants dress in white and dine in a surprise public location.
activities.seasonal_notes: This elegant summer tradition happens in many cities including Bordeaux, usually in June or July.
activities.booking_tips: Registration is required well in advance through local organizers or by invitation from previous attendees.

activities.name: Bordeaux Underwater Archaeology Museum
activities.description: Discover the fascinating Underwater Archaeology Museum (DRASSM), showcasing artifacts recovered from shipwrecks in the region.
activities.seasonal_notes: This cool indoor venue offers a refreshing break from summer heat while providing a unique cultural experience.
activities.booking_tips: Check opening hours before visiting as they can vary seasonally.

activities.name: Sunset Dinner Cruise on the Garonne
activities.description: Enjoy a gourmet dinner aboard a Garonne River cruise, with stunning views of Bordeaux's 18th-century façades illuminated at sunset.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides the best weather for evening cruises, with long daylight hours and warm temperatures.
activities.booking_tips: Book well in advance and request a window table for optimal views.

activities.name: Explore the Cité du Vin
activities.description: Visit Bordeaux's iconic wine museum, Cité du Vin, an immersive experience featuring exhibitions on wine culture from around the world.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is harvest season, making it a perfect time to learn about winemaking as the actual process happens in surrounding vineyards.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid lines and include the rooftop wine tasting with your admission.

activities.name: Harvest Festival at Château Lanessan
activities.description: Experience a traditional grape harvest celebration at Château Lanessan, featuring vineyard tours, grape stomping, and tastings of new vintages.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is grape harvest season (vendange), offering a unique opportunity to see wine production firsthand.
activities.booking_tips: Book your spot in advance as harvest festivals are popular and have limited capacity.

activities.name: Truffle Hunting in Périgord
activities.description: Join a guided truffle hunting expedition in nearby Périgord, followed by a truffle-focused meal showcasing this autumn delicacy.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn marks the beginning of black truffle season in the region, a culinary highlight.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve your truffle hunting experience at least a month in advance as spots fill quickly during peak season.

activities.name: Visit the Grand Théâtre de Bordeaux
activities.description: Tour the magnificent Grand Théâtre, an 18th-century neoclassical masterpiece, and perhaps attend an opera or ballet performance.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn marks the beginning of the new cultural season with premieres and special performances.
activities.booking_tips: Book a guided tour in the morning or secure tickets for an evening performance well in advance.

activities.name: Autumn Walk in Jardin Botanique
activities.description: Take a leisurely stroll through the Botanical Gardens of Bordeaux, enjoying the fall foliage and diverse plant collections.
activities.seasonal_notes: The gardens are particularly beautiful in autumn with vibrant fall colors and fewer crowds.
activities.booking_tips: Visit in the golden hour before sunset for the most beautiful light for photography.

activities.name: Visit to the Museum of Bordeaux Wine and Trade
activities.description: Explore the history of Bordeaux's wine trade in this specialized museum housed in a historic merchant's home near the riverfront.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's cooler days make it perfect for learning about the wine heritage that shaped the region.
activities.booking_tips: Consider the combined ticket with other city museums for better value.

activities.name: Mushroom Foraging in Médoc Forests
activities.description: Join expert guides for a mushroom foraging expedition in the forests of Médoc, learning to identify edible varieties like cèpes and chanterelles.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn rains create perfect conditions for wild mushrooms, a seasonal delicacy in the region.
activities.booking_tips: Book with reputable guides who know safe foraging spots and can identify edible species.

activities.name: Explore the Covered Market of Les Chartrons
activities.description: Wander through this renovated market hall in the historic Chartrons district, featuring artisanal food shops, wine merchants, and cafés.
activities.seasonal_notes: The covered market offers a cozy retreat during autumn's cooler days, with seasonal products like game, mushrooms, and new wines.
activities.booking_tips: Visit on weekday afternoons for a more relaxed experience with fewer crowds.

activities.name: Canelé Making Workshop
activities.description: Learn to make Bordeaux's signature pastry, the canelé, in a hands-on cooking class, mastering the techniques behind this rum and vanilla delicacy.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's cooler weather is perfect for baking, and you'll take home skills to recreate these treats.
activities.booking_tips: Book early as cooking classes are popular, and bring a container to take home your creations.

activities.name: Ice Skating at Place Pey-Berland
activities.description: Enjoy ice skating at the outdoor rink set up in Place Pey-Berland, with views of Bordeaux Cathedral as a majestic backdrop.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the only time to enjoy this seasonal activity, typically running from December through January.
activities.booking_tips: Skate rentals are available on-site; weekday afternoons are less crowded than weekends.

activities.name: Visit to the Christmas Markets
activities.description: Explore Bordeaux's charming Christmas market along Allées de Tourny, offering festive decorations, regional crafts, and seasonal treats like mulled wine and roasted chestnuts.
activities.seasonal_notes: The market creates a magical winter atmosphere with twinkling lights and festive music throughout December.
activities.booking_tips: Visit in the evening when the light displays are most impressive, and try the hot spiced wine (vin chaud).

activities.name: Chamber Music at Grand Théâtre
activities.description: Experience a classical music concert in the stunning setting of Bordeaux's Grand Théâtre, one of France's most beautiful theaters.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter's cultural calendar features excellent concerts and performances in this historic venue.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets well in advance, especially for holiday-themed concerts in December.

activities.name: Visit the Museum of Fine Arts
activities.description: Explore Bordeaux's Museum of Fine Arts, housing an impressive collection spanning from Renaissance to 20th century works.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is perfect for indoor art appreciation when outdoor activities are limited by weather.
activities.booking_tips: Free on the first Sunday of each month; otherwise purchase tickets online to skip the queue.

activities.name: Hot Chocolate at Dunes Blanches
activities.description: Warm up with rich hot chocolate paired with Bordeaux's famous cream puffs at Dunes Blanches, a beloved local patisserie.
activities.seasonal_notes: Their special winter hot chocolate menu features different flavor combinations throughout the season.
activities.booking_tips: Expect a wait on weekends; weekday afternoons are more relaxed.

activities.name: Wine Tasting Course at L'École du Vin
activities.description: Participate in a structured wine tasting course at Bordeaux's School of Wine, learning about regional varieties and proper tasting techniques.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is a great time to deepen your wine knowledge while staying warm indoors.
activities.booking_tips: Book at least a week in advance and specify your experience level when registering.

activities.name: Ballet Performance at Opéra National de Bordeaux
activities.description: Enjoy a ballet performance at the Opéra National de Bordeaux, featuring both classic works and contemporary pieces.
activities.seasonal_notes: The winter season often includes The Nutcracker and other seasonal favorites.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets several weeks in advance, especially for performances during the holiday season.

activities.name: Visit to Basilica of Saint Michael
activities.description: Explore the Gothic Basilica of Saint Michael with its separate bell tower, enjoying the peaceful winter atmosphere and beautiful stained glass.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter light through the stained glass windows creates a magical atmosphere, especially on sunny afternoons.
activities.booking_tips: Check opening hours which may be reduced in winter, and time your visit to catch the afternoon light.

activities.name: Garonne River Winter Cruise
activities.description: Experience a heated river cruise along the Garonne, offering panoramic views of Bordeaux's UNESCO-listed waterfront illuminated for winter.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter cruises feature special holiday decorations and illuminations throughout December.
activities.booking_tips: Choose a heated boat option and book in advance, especially during the Christmas season.
